desc: You find yourself on the bridge of a Romulan destroyer. There are several consoles scattered around the room and a large viewscreen in the center.
name: The Bridge

desc: You are in the ship's boom corridor. The door forward leades to the bridge, aft leads to engineering.
name: Boom Corridor

desc: The console is dim and seems to be defunct.
name: Helm Console

desc: A small handheld tricorder which seems to be powered off.
name: Tricorder
